document.masterDocTitle: Subgeneric classification of the genus Anthaxia Eschscholtz, 1829 (Coleoptera: Buprestidae: Anthaxiini)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Subgeneric classification of the genus Anthaxia Eschscholtz, 1829 (Coleoptera: Buprestidae: Anthaxiini)

subSubSection.paragraph: Head relatively large, as wide as anterior pronotal margin, eyes large but not projecting beyond outline of head; antennae short reaching anterior third of lateral pronotal margins when laid alongside; sculpture consisting of very small, polygonal cells with tiny central grains.

subSubSection.paragraph: Anal ventrite of both sexes simply rounded, legs short, male metatibiae only with very fine, almost invisible, inner serrations.

subSubSection.paragraph:
SPECIES INCLUDED:
Anthaxia ( Capanthaxia ) bellamyi Bílý 2002
,
A . ( C. ) capensis Kerremans, 1903
,
A . ( C. ) hilaris Gory, 1841
.

NOTE. All three species were attributed by Bellamy (2008) and Bílý (2002) to the subgenus
Haplanthaxia
.
